articles.title: GRAINS-Corn, soybeans dip, but wheat holds firm on Ukraine worries
articles.description: Sept 23 (Reuters) - U.S. corn and soybean futures dipped in Asian trading on Friday, while wheat held firm near the previous session's 10-week high and was set for a weekly advance on Black Sea supply concerns.Corn and soybeans were also set for weekly gains as traders assessed the impact of dry weather in crop areas of Argentina and the U.S.

articles.title: Rich Lister Kahlbetzers enter new era after selling Argentina farms
articles.description: The Kahlbetzer family is walking away from farming in Argentina after a record-breaking asset sale and will try to recapture some of its former glory in Australian agriculture when the time is right.
articles.content:
